data.question: What is the purpose of sequential linker installation (SLI) in the synthesis of multivariate MOFs?
data.answer: The purpose of sequential linker installation (SLI) is to construct multivariate MOFs with functional groups precisely positioned.

data.question: What is the chemical formula for PCN-700?
True or False: PCN-701 has a different chemical formula compared to PCN-700.
What method is used to pinpoint the positions of installed linkers in PCN-700?
What is the yield of PCN-700 synthesis?
True or False: The synthesis of PCN-703 results in a change in the unit cell size compared to PCN-700.
What is the role of H2Me2-BPDC in the synthesis of PCN-700?
data.answer: H2Me2-BPDC acts as a linker in the construction of PCN-700.

data.question: True or False: The BET surface area of PCN-701 is higher than that of PCN-703.
What is the crystal system of PCN-700?
True or False: The linker ratio from single crystal structure and from 1H NMR of digested sample for PCN-703 are different.
What is the space group of PCN-703?
True or False: PCN-702 and PCN-703 have the same space group.
What is the main challenge in locating the exact position of each component in MTV-MOFs?
data.answer: The disordered distribution of functional groups makes it a challenge.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of mixed-linker Zr-MOFs using a one-pot approach always results in a single phase.
What is the significance of the Zr6 cluster in the construction of MTV-MOFs?
data.answer: The Zr6 cluster provides exceptional stability and tunable connectivity for MTV-MOFs.

data.question: True or False: The SLI strategy is performed under harsh conditions.
What is the yield of PCN-703 synthesis?
True or False: The BET surface area increases from PCN-700 to PCN-704.
What is the role of DMF in the synthesis of PCN-700?
data.answer: DMF acts as a solvent in the synthesis process.

data.question: True or False: The linker ratio from single crystal structure and from 1H NMR of digested sample for PCN-704 are identical.
